With everyone holding their respective expectations, the operation moves forward.  On the other side in Euro Britannia, Shin, who made his benefactor commit suicide with the mysterious power of “Geass”, is appointed the leader of the Knights of St. Michael. However, treating androids on the same level as humans is frowned upon, and there is constant paranoia surrounding the possibility of robots defying humans, their masters. Those who appear too trustworthy of their androids are chided and labeled as \"android-holics\". Rikuo Sakisaka, who has taken robots for granted for his entire life, one day discovers that Sammy, his home android, has been acting independently and coming and going on her own. He finds a strange phrase recorded in her activity log, \"Are you enjoying the time of EVE?\". He, along with his friend Masakazu Masaki, traces Sammy's movements and finds an unusual café. Nagi, the barista, informs them that the café's main rule is to not discriminate between humans and androids. While Rikuo tries to reveal Sammy's intentions, he begins to question the legitimacy of the fear that drives humans to regard androids as nothing more than mere tools.","poster_path":"/kr5WBI8XF266hVNu9nT2wQwPg0J.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,878,18],"popularity":16.081,"release_date":"2010-03-06","video":false,"vote_average":7.241,"vote_count":145},{"backdrop_path":"/mXJOL3IDnlpUtvFPcmPqGDXOcj7.jpg","id":23150,"title":"The Garden of Sinners: Overlooking View","original_title":"劇場版「空の境界」第一章 俯瞰風景","overview":"The story starts following an incident: a young girl jumps from the top of a building. The image provokes a certain dread, as the girl appears to have been a corpse even before she jumped. The case is dismissed, yet more and more of these suicides occur, and all from the same building. Thus began the rumour, that a ghost inhabited the rooftop of the building.","poster_path":"/yCd8RiGzEcVBZydYjUDsIpVKy7R.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,80,28,14],"popularity":17.528,"release_date":"2007-12-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.687,"vote_count":131},{"backdrop_path":"/gXIcwtfL9vFdYDTNnoQLSzIYiOC.jpg","id":371759,"title":"Doctor Who: The Husbands of River Song","original_title":"Doctor Who: The Husbands of River Song","overview":"It’s Christmas Day on a remote human colony and the Doctor is hiding from Christmas Carols and Comedy Antlers. King Hydroflax is furious, and his giant Robot bodyguard is out-of-control and coming for them all! Will Nardole survive? And when will River Song work out who the Doctor is? All will be revealed on a starliner full of galactic super-villains and a destination the Doctor has been avoiding for a very long time.","poster_path":"/9kFkdqbJYHL7pfGZ5uBw4rCwJjJ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,878,35],"popularity":13.058,"release_date":"2015-12-25","video":false,"vote_average":8.0,"vote_count":152},{"backdrop_path":"/uDcs9eKcNgPadTlxuG0O3wzdkjt.jpg","id":196750,"title":"Ghost in the Shell: Arise - Border 1: Ghost Pain","original_title":"攻殻機動隊ARISE border: 1 Ghost Pain","overview":"The story is set in 2027, one year after the end of the fourth non-nuclear war. New Port City is still reeling from the war's aftermath when it suffers a bombing caused by a self-propelled mine. Then, a military member implicated in arms-dealing bribes is gunned down.  During the investigation, Public Security Section's Daisuke Aramaki encounters Motoko Kusanagi, the cyborg, wizard-level hacker assigned to the military's 501st Secret Unit. Batou, a man with the \"eye that does not sleep,\" suspects that Kusanagi is the one behind the bombing. The Niihama Prefectural Police detective Togusa is pursuing his own dual cases of the shooting death and a prostitute's murder. Motoko herself is being watched by the 501st Secret Unit's head Kurutsu and cyborg agents.","poster_path":"/p0kHK9nJoLzpqa6tqOzPgPkdxYN.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[28,16,80,878],"popularity":16.372,"release_date":"2013-06-22","video":false,"vote_average":7.142,"vote_count":186},{"backdrop_path":"/x3HAZPrhIetDEar4vlEuncVXRL.jpg","id":20411,"title":"Until Death","original_title":"Until Death","overview":"Anthony Stowe is a dirty cop who is hooked on heroin—and everyone hates him.
